head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CUDDY, WILLIAM VINCENT

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CUDDY, WILLIAM VINCENT

block.p: CUDDY-William Vincent. Of Nantucket, MA, and Naples, FL. Died October 14, 2000. Beloved husband of Katherine Mahoney Cuddy. Loving father of Maura Rau, Wililam V. Cuddy, Jr, Patricia Jaouen, Megan Cuddy, Christopher Cuddy and nine grandchildren. Visiting hours Tuesday from 5 to 9PM at McMahon, Lyon and Hartnett Funeral Home, White Plains, NY, (914) 949-7777. Mass Wednesday, October 18th, at 10 A.M., at St. Bernard's Church.
